physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a cemetery. The ground is uneven and it elevates from the foreground of the photograph. There are trees in the background. Tombstones with their mounds can be seen all over the ground.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows a view of Chinese cemetery on a hillside
title_text: Photograph of Chinese cemetery on a hillside
